youtube.title: How Muscles Heal After a Workout: The Science Explained!
youtube.description: Discover the incredible process of muscle repair and growth. In this video, we visualize what happens inside your muscle fibers after a workout to help you understand recovery and hypertrophy better. Subscribe to MedGloss for more simple biology!
